properties.name: org.techbd.service.api.http.fhir.app.version
properties.description: The active version, injected from pom.xml in application.properties via @project.version@

properties.name: org.techbd.service.api.http.fhir.app.default-sdoh-fhir-profile-url
properties.description: The default FHIR Profile used for principal validation of SDoH data

properties.name: org.techbd.service.api.http.interactions.default-persist-strategy
properties.description: Default persistence strategy for all HTTP request/response JSON content.

properties.name: admin.observe.neon.datasource.url
properties.description: The data source URL. The value will be taken from the environment variable TECH_BD_PERSIST_JDBC_URL_WITHOUT_CREDENTIALS

properties.name: admin.observe.neon.datasource.username
properties.description: The data source username. The value will be taken from the environment variable TECH_BD_PERSIST_JDBC_USERNAME

properties.name: admin.observe.neon.datasource.password
properties.description: The data source username. The value will be taken from the environment variable TECH_BD_PERSIST_JDBC_PASSWORD
